instruction.instruction_1: Set a large pot of salted water to boil. Cook pasta until al dente according to package directions.
instruction.instruction_2: While the pasta is cooking, melt olive oil and butter in a large nonstick pan over medium-high heat. Add onion; saut√© for about 3 minutes until soft and translucent. Stir in garlic and cook for 30 seconds until fragrant.
instruction.instruction_3: Add in the tomatoes (with their juices) and artichokes; gently stir to combine.
instruction.instruction_4: Add in the salt, pepper, and nutmeg. Let simmer for 5 minutes.
instruction.instruction_5: Reduce heat to low and add in the cream and broth. Stir in the Parmesan. Warm through. Taste and adjust seasoning, if necessary.
instruction.instruction_6: Drain the pasta and add to the sauce and mix thoroughly. Sprinkle with parsley, toss, and serve hot.

ingredient.ingredient_6: 15 ounce can Italian seasoned diced tomatoes , undrained
ingredient.ingredient_7: 14 ounce can quartered artichoke hearts , drained
ingredient.ingredient_12: 1/2 cup low sodium vegetable broth ( or chicken broth)
